snippet: A sport utility vehicle careered over an embankment separating the northbound and southbound lanes and went into oncoming traffic, the police said.
abstract: New York State police say out-of-control sport utility vehicle caused four-car collision on Taconic State Parkway, leaving three people dead and eight injured.
lead_paragraph: A sport utility vehicle careered over an embankment separating the northbound and southbound lanes and went into oncoming traffic, the police said.

headline.main: Three Killed and Eight Injured in Crash on Taconic State Parkway
headline.print_headline: 3 Killed in Taconic State Parkway Crash
